name: Breathings.app
slogan: Creating local mindfulness experiences for happier lives
description: Breathings is a mindful breathing app designed to give users a local mindfulness experience. At Breathings.app we believe "Meditation and mindfulness is a privilege that should be accessible to everyone".

jobs.title: Android Developer
jobs.description:
- Designing and developing for the Android platform
- Unit-testing code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
- Bug fixing and improving application performance

We are looking for an Android Developer who possesses a passion for pushing mobile technologies to the limits. This Android app developer will work with our team of talented engineers to design and build the next generation of our mobile applications. Android programming works closely with other app development and technical teams

Design and build advanced applications for the Android platform
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
Work with outside data sources and APIs
Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
Work on bug fixing and improving application performance
Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency

BS/MS degree in Computer Science is not madatory*
Proven software development experience and Android skills development
Proven working experience in Android app development and
Have published at least one original Android app
Experience with Android SDK
Experience working with remote data via REST and JSON
Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
• Designing and developing for the Android platform
  • Unit-testing code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
  • Bug fixing and improving application performance

Experience working with remote data via REST and JSON

Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle.

jobs.title: Daily Content Creator
jobs.description:
Must have a strong command of style and voice in order to write, execute and develop a wide range of creative concepts and compelling content.

Researching industry-related topics
Preparing well-structured drafts using digital word processing and publishing platforms
Creating and distributing marketing copy to advertise our company and products


Responsibilities
• Create content such as emails, social media messages, blogs and ebooks.
• Participate in planning and strategizing for inbound marketing campaign execution including content, content schedule, platforms and measurements
• Develop benchmarks and goals for each campaign and ensure they are reached
• Participate in team meetings
• Develop content for channel promotion
• Learn and use inbound marketing software
• Generate new ideas and opportunities to ensure growth and success


Requirements
• Work well independently
• Great time management skills
• Collaborate with coworkers and interface with clients
• Love to hustle


Bonus Points
• Previous experience with digital and social media tools
• Previous content creation experience
• Previous experience with Adobe Suite
• Interest in the Mental Health industry


Perks
• Be an important part of a small team
• Attend events and conferences
• Responsibility and autonomy

jobs.title: Graphic Designer Intern
jobs.description:
• Designing social media images, gifs and videos
• Understand the Design & Creative Brief
- Execute good quality, International looking Designs

Also
1. Designing emailers & digital e-banners
2. Creating mock-ups/images/adaptive designs on the fly
3. Crafting email marketing collaterals and adapt as per email dimensions
4. Working on Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, Corel Draw, InDesign, Final Cut Pro, etc.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
• Designing social media images, gifs and videos
• Understand the Design & Creative Brief

  • Execute good quality, International looking Designs

Also

  1. Designing emailers & digital e-banners
  2. Creating mock-ups/images/adaptive designs on the fly
  3. Crafting email marketing collaterals and adapt as per email dimensions
  4. Working on Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, Corel Draw, InDesign, Final Cut Pro, etc.

jobs.title: Android developer Intern
jobs.description:
We are looking for an Intern - Android Development who possesses a passion for pushing mobile technologies to the limits and will work with our team of talented engineers to design and build the next generation of our mobile applications.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Designing and building advanced applications for the Android platform

2. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features

3. Working with outside data sources and API's

4. Unit-testing code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability

5. Working on bug fixing and improving application performance

6. Working on continuously discovering, evaluating, and implementing new technologies to maximize development efficiency
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We are looking for an Intern - Android Development who possesses a passion for pushing mobile technologies to the limits and will work with our team of talented engineers to design and build the next generation of our mobile applications.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

  1. Designing and building advanced applications for the Android platform

  2. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features

  3. Working with outside data sources and API's

  4. Unit-testing code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability

  5. Working on bug fixing and improving application performance

  6. Working on continuously discovering, evaluating, and implementing new technologies to maximize development efficiency

jobs.title: Graphics Designer
jobs.description:
• Consult with marketing, copywriting teams to create cohesive designs that reflect our  cultures and goals
• Incorporate changes recommended by the Internal team into the final design
• Work closely with developer and copywriter to deliver the best solution
• Create visual aspects of marketing materials, websites and other media, including infographics
• Put together disparate elements of a design created by another professional, such as the icons, photographs and other components necessary for a website design

Required Experience and Qualifications
• Bachelor’s Degree in Fine Art Design, Marketing or related discipline.
• Extensive experience with Illustrator, Photoshop, and Corel Draw, specifically with mockups, web design and multimedia presentation.
• Adaptive design eye and skill.
• Good communication skills

• Adaptive design eye and skill.
• Good communication skills
